title: Five-Star Escape with Executive Lounge Access in Stylish Johannesburg
description: Planning a chic city escape to Johannesburg? Look no further than the Hilton Sandton, a five-star hotel with an enviable location in the city’s most stylish area. Whether you’re in town for business or leisure, the Hilton Sandton will have everything you’re looking for. Includes a complimentary upgrade from a Deluxe Room to a King Executive Room, exclusive access to the Executive Club Lounge, daily breakfast and a welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: 138 Rivonia Rd, Sandown, Sandton, 2196, South Africa
